title: yamana shAsana
sahitya:
yamana shAsana kELo jIva idu samshayavillendu eNisu svabhAva


caraNam 1    para satiyara nODidavage pattu koraDu kempage kAsi kukki kaNNoLage 
eraDu guDDanu pIkOravage sIsava kragisi poyyuvaro avana kiviyoLage
   caraNam 2    anya strI puruSara sanga tannavara kula aLisiTTu hAkuvaranga 
narakakke guri mADi tunga keNDa uriva ukkina kambha kaTTippa bhanga
    caraNam 3    para sati merevOdu kaNDu gANa oraLoLagADisi oNagisi beNDu 
uri tailadoLage hAki guNDu karida teranAgi handiyadinisuva gaNDu
    caraNam 4    anya strI vicAra mOha viTTiha ghanna ghAtakage gaLarandenIha 
benna carmava kitti dEha kuTTi ghOrisi bAdhisi kADalikke baha
    caraNam 5    gaNDanindali kelasa mADi koNDa heNDirige gaDu hiDidvara kADi 
maNDe kUdalu innu kittIDADi gaNDa gaNDava kitti daNDippa nODi
    caraNam 6    atikAnkSe strIyarallinda janmada sadgati kELOde ati krUradinda 
raNahaddu gumbu jateyinda pIDi pIDisuvanu mudadi mukunda
    caraNam 7    innu pApagaLa nI mADa bEDa anyara koDvege nI hOga bEDa 
sajjanara sanga biDa bEDa cenna purandara viTTalanna bhajisadira bEDa
